description: Anvide Seal Folder — a program to protect folders password instant. It will reliably hide sensitive data on hard drives and removable media. For each folder, you can set a separate password. No need to install a special driver. There is no need to keep it constantly running. It has a convenient and user-friendly interface. For advanced users available work from the command line.
summary: Anvide Seal Folder — a program to protect folders password instant.
author: Anvide Labs
